unnormalised: Arre yaar, this biryani recipe says add 250 gms of rice, but my measuring scale decided to go on holiday! Guessing the quantity using my "andaaz," wish me luck and hope it doesn't turn into a khichdi instead.
normalised: Arre yaar, this biryani recipe says add two hundred and fifty grams of rice, but my measuring scale decided to go on holiday! Guessing the quantity using my "andaaz," wish me luck and hope it doesn't turn into a khichdi instead.
